title: Harsher penalties for harassment
body: The amount of games i have entered and the amount of harassment i have seen is the most i've ever seen in a online game, this picture is just an example. I think riot should penalize harassers harsher and give them bans, this sort of behavior is just unacceptable and ruins my experience and how i perform during a game.
